main_menu.title: OMRON PROXIMITY SENSOR SOLUTIONS
main_menu.description: Omron proximity sensors are engineered for reliable non-contact detection in demanding industrial environments, providing precise sensing of metallic and non-metallic objects. These sensors are widely used in automation lines, packaging systems, and material handling applications where durability, accuracy, and consistent performance are critical. Their rugged construction ensures long service life even under vibration, dust, oil, and moisture exposure.
features: High sensing accuracy with stable output
Robust metal housings for industrial use
Fast switching response for high-speed automation
Long operational life with minimal maintenance

menu_drop1.name: E2B Series
menu_drop1.description: The Omron E2B Series inductive proximity sensors are designed for dependable metal object detection in harsh factory conditions. They feature strong mechanical durability, excellent noise immunity, and long sensing distances, making them ideal for conveyor systems, machine tools, and automated production equipment. Their compact cylindrical design allows easy installation even in space-limited control panels while ensuring consistent long-term performance.
specs: M8, M12, M18, M30 housing options
High resistance to vibration and impact

menu_drop2.name: E2A Series
menu_drop2.description: The E2A Series offers a cost-effective sensing solution without compromising reliability or performance. These proximity sensors provide stable detection in standard automation environments and are widely used in packaging machines, assembly lines, and automated sorting systems. Their simple wiring design and LED operation indicators allow quick installation and easy troubleshooting for maintenance teams.

menu_drop3.name: Inductive Sensors
menu_drop3.description: Omron inductive sensors provide highly accurate metal detection with extended sensing ranges and superior reliability in demanding industrial processes. They are specifically designed to operate consistently in high-speed automation environments where precise object positioning is essential. Their durable design ensures stable performance even in the presence of oil mist, dust, vibration, and temperature fluctuations.

menu_drop4.name: Capacitive Sensors
menu_drop4.description: Omron capacitive proximity sensors are capable of detecting a wide variety of materials including plastic, glass, powders, liquids, and granules. These sensors are commonly used in level detection applications such as tanks, silos, and hoppers, as well as packaging machinery. Their adjustable sensitivity allows fine-tuning for reliable operation across different material types and environmental conditions.
specs: Detects both metallic and non-metallic objects

menu_drop5.name: Pre Wired Sensors
menu_drop5.description: Pre-wired proximity sensors from Omron are designed to simplify installation and reduce wiring time in industrial automation systems. These sensors come with factory-attached cables that ensure secure connections and minimize field wiring errors. They are ideal for fast deployment in conveyor systems, assembly machines, and production lines requiring quick sensor replacement.

menu_drop6.name: M12 Connector Type
menu_drop6.description: Omron M12 connector type proximity sensors provide flexible wiring and fast maintenance through standardized industrial connectors. These sensors are particularly suitable for modular automation systems where frequent replacement or reconfiguration is required. The secure locking mechanism ensures stable signal transmission even under vibration-heavy industrial conditions.

main_menu2.title: OMRON PHOTO SENSOR SOLUTIONS
main_menu2.description: Omron photoelectric sensors are engineered for high-precision non-contact detection in modern industrial automation systems. Designed to operate reliably in challenging environments, these sensors ensure accurate object detection across conveyor lines, packaging machinery, assembly systems, and material handling applications. With advanced optical technology and robust construction, they deliver consistent performance even under dust, vibration, and ambient light interference.
features: Stable operation under vibration and dust
Low maintenance with long operational life

menu_drop2_1.name: Diffuse Photo Sensors
menu_drop2_1.description: Diffuse photoelectric sensors detect objects by emitting light and receiving reflection directly from the target surface. These sensors are ideal for short-range detection and compact automation systems where space efficiency and ease of installation are important. They provide reliable performance without requiring an external reflector.
specs: Ideal for packaging and conveyor systems

menu_drop2_2.name: Retroreflective Photo Sensors
menu_drop2_2.description: Retroreflective sensors use a reflector to return emitted light back to the receiver. When an object interrupts the beam, detection occurs. These sensors offer longer sensing distances than diffuse types and are suitable for industrial conveyor systems and automated production lines.

menu_drop2_3.name: Through Beam Photo Sensors
menu_drop2_3.description: Through beam sensors consist of separate transmitter and receiver units placed opposite each other. They provide the highest sensing range and detection reliability among photoelectric sensors, making them ideal for heavy-duty industrial automation applications.

main_menu3.title: OMRON RELAY SOLUTIONS
main_menu3.description: Omron industrial relays are designed for reliable switching and control applications across automation systems, machinery panels, and electrical control circuits. Known for durability, stable contact performance, and long service life, these relays ensure dependable operation in demanding industrial environments.

menu_drop3_1.name: MY2N Relay
menu_drop3_1.description: The MY2N is a general-purpose 2-pole relay designed for control panels and industrial automation systems. It offers reliable switching performance with clear LED indicators for easy status monitoring.

menu_drop3_2.name: MY4N Relay
menu_drop3_2.description: The MY4N relay provides 4-pole switching capability for advanced control applications. It is widely used in automation panels requiring multiple switching outputs.

menu_drop3_3.name: LY2N Relay
menu_drop3_3.description: The LY2N relay is a heavy-duty industrial relay suitable for high-load applications. Its robust construction ensures reliable performance in demanding industrial conditions.

menu_drop3_4.name: LY4N Relay
menu_drop3_4.description: The LY4N offers four-pole switching with high current capacity, making it ideal for complex control circuits and automation systems.

menu_drop3_5.name: G2RV Slim Relay
menu_drop3_5.description: The G2RV slim relay is designed for space-saving panel installations. Its compact design makes it ideal for high-density control cabinets while maintaining reliable switching performance.

main_menu4.title: OMRON LIMIT SWITCH SOLUTIONS
main_menu4.description: Omron limit switches are designed for accurate position detection and mechanical motion control in industrial automation systems. Built with rugged metal housings and high durability contacts, these switches ensure reliable operation in harsh factory environments including vibration, dust, and oil exposure.

menu_drop4_1.name: WLDA2 Limit Switch
menu_drop4_1.description: The WLDA2 is a heavy-duty industrial limit switch suitable for machine tools, conveyors, and automated systems. It provides reliable mechanical position sensing with strong resistance to vibration and impact.

main_menu5.title: OMRON SAFETY CURTAIN SOLUTIONS
main_menu5.description: Omron safety light curtains provide advanced machine safety protection by creating an invisible infrared safety barrier. These systems are widely used in manufacturing plants to protect operators from hazardous machinery while maintaining production efficiency.

menu_drop5_1.name: Type 4 Safety Curtain
menu_drop5_1.description: Type 4 safety light curtains provide the highest level of protection according to international safety standards. They are ideal for hazardous machinery where maximum operator safety is required.

menu_drop5_2.name: Safety Curtains 200 – 1200 mm
menu_drop5_2.description: Available in protection heights ranging from 200 mm to 1200 mm, these safety curtains offer flexible protection coverage for different industrial machine sizes and applications.

main_menu6.title: OMRON TIMER SOLUTIONS
main_menu6.description: Omron industrial timers provide accurate and reliable time control for automation systems, machinery, and control panels. Designed for durability and precision, these timers ensure consistent performance in industrial environments.

menu_drop6_1.name: AT8N Timer
menu_drop6_1.description: The AT8N is a versatile industrial timer designed for automation panels and machine control applications. It offers stable timing functions with easy configuration and durable construction.

main_menu7.title: OMRON COUNTER SOLUTIONS
main_menu7.description: Omron digital counters are designed for accurate counting operations in industrial automation systems. They provide reliable performance for production lines, packaging systems, and material handling applications.

menu_drop7_1.name: H7EC Counter
menu_drop7_1.description: The H7EC is a compact and reliable electronic counter ideal for production monitoring and batch counting applications in industrial environments.

main_menu8.title: OMRON TEMPERATURE CONTROLLERS
main_menu8.description: Omron temperature controllers deliver precise thermal regulation for industrial heating and cooling applications. Designed for accuracy and durability, they ensure stable temperature control in demanding environments.

menu_drop8_1.name: E5CC Temperature Controller
menu_drop8_1.description: The E5CC provides advanced PID temperature control with high accuracy and user-friendly interface. Ideal for industrial ovens, heaters, and process control systems.

menu_drop8_2.name: E5CW Temperature Controller
menu_drop8_2.description: The E5CW is a reliable temperature controller designed for stable and efficient thermal management in industrial machinery.

main_menu9.title: OMRON SMPS SOLUTIONS
main_menu9.description: Omron Switch Mode Power Supplies (SMPS) provide stable and efficient power delivery for industrial automation systems. Designed for reliability and compact installation, they ensure consistent voltage output in demanding environments.

menu_drop9_1.name: S8VS SMPS
menu_drop9_1.description: The S8VS series offers reliable and efficient DC power supply solutions for industrial control panels and automation systems.

main_menu10.title: OMRON ENCODER SOLUTIONS
main_menu10.description: Omron rotary encoders provide precise position and speed feedback for motion control applications. Designed for reliability and accuracy, they are widely used in automation, robotics, and conveyor systems.

menu_drop10_1.name: E6B2 Encoder
menu_drop10_1.description: The E6B2 is a compact rotary encoder designed for accurate position and speed feedback in automation systems.

menu_drop10_2.name: E6C2 Encoder
menu_drop10_2.description: The E6C2 provides reliable rotary position detection for industrial motion control and automation applications.

main_menu11.title: OMRON PLC SOLUTIONS
main_menu11.description: Omron PLC systems deliver reliable and high-speed control for industrial automation applications. Designed for flexibility and scalability, they are widely used in manufacturing, process control, and machine automation.

menu_drop11_1.name: CP1E PLC
menu_drop11_1.description: The CP1E is a compact and cost-effective PLC designed for small automation systems with reliable control performance.

menu_drop11_2.name: CP2E PLC
menu_drop11_2.description: The CP2E offers enhanced connectivity with built-in Ethernet and improved data handling for smart automation systems.

menu_drop11_3.name: CJ1M PLC
menu_drop11_3.description: The CJ1M is a modular PLC designed for medium-scale automation with flexible configuration and high processing speed.

menu_drop11_4.name: CJ2M PLC
menu_drop11_4.description: The CJ2M provides high-performance control with advanced networking, motion control, and data processing capabilities.

main_menu12.title: OMRON HMI SOLUTIONS
main_menu12.description: Omron HMI panels provide intuitive visualization and control for industrial automation systems. Designed for durability and ease of use, they enhance operator efficiency and system monitoring.

menu_drop12_1.name: NB7 HMI
menu_drop12_1.description: The NB7 is a high-performance touch screen HMI designed for real-time monitoring and control of industrial automation systems.
